caption:
It's American Heart Month, and tomorrow February 7th is Wear Red Day! We want to encourage our community members to wear red to inspire conversations surrounding heart health. Here are some tips to build healthy heart habits!
1. Stay active by walking 30 minutes a day!
2. Follow a balanced diet full of whole grains, fruits, and vegetables!
3. Get plenty of sleep by sticking to a good sleep routine!

Keep up those heart healthy habits!

#WearRed #AmericanHeartMonth #OurHearts
 @TheHeartTruth_NHLBI
